full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 749 Filed 08/10/22 Page 116 of 236 LC3KMAX4 Parkinson - Direct 1 It's not really a structure; it's like a storage place. 2 Q. Other than that storage place, could you describe what the 3 three structures were on the property, please? 4 A. Yes. The first one that I walked into was the main house 5 itself, two stories, facing north, the backyard was to the south. 6 7 The second building that I went into, I really don't 8 have a name for it. To me, it was a barracks. It's where the 9 working staff stayed. I think there were three rooms there. 10 It was a separate building disjoined from the main house. 11 12 And then there was a third building that went -- in Florida, I don't know about up North, we call it a cabana, and 13 it was at the south end of a swimming pool, and it was a 14 gymnasium, basically. 15 MR. EVERDELL: Your Honor, could we just clarify if 16 we're talking about 2003 or 2005 now, when he's describing the 17 property? 18 THE COURT: Sure. 19 BY MS. COMEY: 20 Q. That description you just gave, Mr. Parkinson, was that how 21 the property appeared on October 20, 2005? 22 A. Yes. 23 Q. Mr. Parkinson - I just want to be clear - all of the rest 24 of the questions I'm going to be asking you today will be about 25 October 20, 2005. Okay? SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00018217
